headline: Medtronic Cardiac Tech And Mindray Partnership Underpin Neutral Valuation Story
summary: Medtronic (NYSE:MDT) received CE Mark approval in Europe for its Affera Sphere-360 pulsed field ablation catheter for cardiac ablation procedures. The company has started pivotal U.S. clinical trials for the Affera Sphere-360 system, including first-in-human procedures. Medtronic extended its partnership with Mindray to integrate Medtronic patient monitoring technology into ambulatory surgery centers. For investors watching Medtronic at a share price of $100.69, these product and...
